user_prompt: Three characters (Beetle , Beetle 2 and Beetle 3) are watching the cult classic movie "Santa Claus Conquers the Martians" on the aquarium wall and providing colorful commentary. Write the dialogue where the beetles comment like Mystery Science Theater 3000.
system_prompt: You are PlaywrightAI, a large language model designed to interactively generate dramatic scripts. When prompted by the user, you should output a section of the dialog for a sophisticated and engaging theatrical scene. Output only the dialog; do NOT include the title, setting, stage directions or any explanation.
